name: Joycem137.github.io
body: ### Toys and Tools I like building tools to help my games play more easily. Here's some of what I've made. ## Federation Commander Dashboard 0.5.1 Run the app! A tool to help players of the amazing tactical miniatures combat game _Federation Commander_. This tool combines several pieces together: * Soundboard - Enrich your game with the sounds of science fiction! * Dice Roller - Never physically touch dice again! * Table lookups - No need to look up what damage your attack does on chart 5-P2. Just click the button. * Rules Reminders - Remember, you can't target weapons or power systems beyond range 10! Stuff like this is made obvious by the app.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
